lg.head: Funeral sounds
lg.l: The clank of cavalry—even the saddles, ac⹀
the movement swift and firm and heavy,
The hurryingsuddenbattle hurry and the noise—the cannon thud—the war's grim game in earnest
The rifle r crackThe scout,Advancing and retreating— the freshestnew⹀brought word— the rifles ‸instantaneous order issued
The rifel crack—the cannon thud— the rapid movement of the companies
